entries.tooltip_ui_palette: You can choose between several previously defined color schemes for the UI.
entries.tooltip_volume_combat_music: Move this slider to modify the volume of the music during combat.
entries.tooltip_volume_player_music: Move this slider to modify the volume of player music heard in the game.  This also modifies what you hear from your own band, if you are a musician.
entries.tooltip_volume_user_interface: Move this slider to modify the volume of the sound effects heard while interacting with the user interface windows and controls.
entries.tooltip_volume_background_music: Move this slider to modify the volume of background music in the game.
entries.tooltip_volume_effects: Move this slider to modify the volume of sound effects in the game.
entries.tooltip_volume_master: Move this slider to modify the overall sound volume level in the game.
entries.tooltip_max_sounds: Use the pull-down menu below this option to choose the maximum number of sounds that can play at once.
entries.tooltip_enable: Check this box to enable or disable all sound.
entries.caption: Sound
